attributes.action: Enforce homework given by schools during half-term holidays to be made optional
attributes.background: As a fellow student myself I find it very hard to believe that schools give us a break from the tasks and work to then have the audacity to give us more work to be done during our holiday. I believe that the school system should make homework optional so that students can do the task if they want to

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. It is clear that you are concerned about homework. We're not sure whether you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take action on homework in half term holidays only or all school holidays. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
